name: Speed Street: Sports Racing
description:
Speed Street: Sports Racing is no.1 racing game that puts you into the seat of your favorite luxury super sports cars! Designed for spirited performance and nimble handling, sports cars are your best speed machines to conquer the street and sky! Launch yourself between chaos, drive or drift as you hit the pedal and roll into sports car culture now. Pickup your dream super cars, steer onto the streets driving reckless and juiced as sparks fly, never back down as you race anyone crazy enough to take you on! The tilt-to-turn handles perfectly, and the surge of acceleration is beyond satisfying. Its’ so immersive that you would wonder why weren’t conducting TV interviews after each race!
Features:
- Real dynamic game feeling with endless fun.
- Easy driving controls.
- Accurate physics.
- Realistic sound environment.
- Beautiful 3D graphics.
- Camera View From Driver.
